title: The Amazing Light Bulb
image_desc: A close-up shot of a glowing light bulb, showcasing its filament or LED array.
narration: Hey everyone! Let's talk about the light bulb – a truly amazing invention!  It's something we take for granted, but imagine life without it.  This simple device brought light to the darkness, allowing us to work and live longer into the night.  And there are so many different kinds now, from the old-fashioned incandescent bulbs to super-efficient LEDs.  Pretty cool, huh?
